insert into t_snatch_goods (waybill_plan_id, offer_date, offer_id, offer_name, offer_phone, is_using, company_id, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted,plan_company_id) values (#{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsing,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, , #{planCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_snatch_goods set waybill_plan_id = #{waybillPlanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, offer_date = #{offerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, offer_id = #{offerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, offer_name = #{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offer_phone = #{offerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_using = #{isUsing,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, plan_company_id = #{planCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where snatch_goods_id = #{snatchGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select snatch_goods_id, waybill_plan_id, offer_date, offer_id, offer_name, offer_phone, is_using, company_id, create_id, create_name, create_date, update_id, update_name, update_time, is_deleted,plan_company_id from t_snatch_goods where snatch_goods_id = #{snatchGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
